attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can we allow a person who broke the immigration law which SHE passed be allowed to continue to be Attorney General.  Employers must copy right to work permits or passports and keep them on file for ALL employees whether British or not and the threat of fines or imprisonment are large.  It is morally not right that Baroness Scotland is allowed to remain in office as she has broken the law, made worse by her law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
